info.name: Cloud Backup Server
info.description:
# API that serves as a Cloud Backup System

## Tools/Stack used:

- Node.Js (Typescript and Express)
    
- Postgres
    
- Docker
    
- Postman
    
- Cloudinary cloud storage provider
    

## GitHub Repository:

- [Cloud Backup Server](https://github.com/RevEmmanuel/cloud-backup-server/)
    

## Documentation:

- [Postman Documentation](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/24879226/2s9Y5Wvhvw)
    

## Functionalities:

- Users can create an account
    
- Users can upload files up to 200mb
    
- Users can download uploaded files
    
- Users can create folders to hold files
    
- Users can stream videos and audio
    
- An admin user type for managing the content uploaded
    
- Admins can mark pictures and videos as unsafe
    
- Unsafe files automatically get deleted (Multiple admin reviews before file is deleted)
    
- Revokable session management

This folder contains all authorization requests:

- Signup
- Email verification
- Login
- Admin Registration
    
- Restore User account

item.name: Files
item.description:
This folder contains all file requests:

- Upload file
    
- View user's files
    
- Find file

- Delete user
    
- Revoke user sessions
    
- Get current user making request

item.description:
This folder contains all Admin action requests:

- Invite Admin
    
- Mark file as unsafe
    
- View all users
    
- View all files
    
- Disable user account
    
- Send email to user
    
- View user's files
    
- Find A File
    
- Find a user

item.name: Folder

This folder contains all Folder requests:

- Create Folder
    
- Add file to folder
    
- Get files in folder
    
- Find folder
